entry.def: Gristle is a tough, rubbery substance found in meat, especially in meat of poor quality, which is unpleasant to eat.

means.word_mean: 1. tough elastic tissue; mostly converted to bone in adults

auth_sentence.content: It is lean silverside, with no gristle and no fat.
